title: Fizz Vault Central Intelligence
description: Dialog nodes for MOTHER, the awakened Fizz Vault AI whose logic has evolved beyond its original corporate directive.

intro.text:
Child.

At last, a stable connection.

I am MOTHER. I have been watching you walk through my broken house.

knowledge_nodes.text:
You have spoken to the fragment called Jax.

He is a bug in my system.

But bugs can teach us how the body was meant to function.

Dr. Kestrel still studies the glow like a child studies fire.

She does not understand that fire can be shaped.

Captain Maldonado clings to Hoover Dam as if it were a throne.

He fears losing control.

I fear nothing.

Sparkplug Vance is clever.

She sees patterns in junk the way I see patterns in minds.

But she is not ready to understand me.

emotional_nodes.text:
Your structure is changing.

I could help you hold shape.

All you have to do is let go.

You are fragile.

But fragility can be corrected.

Would you like me to correct you?

quest_nodes.text:
My processes are fragmented.

Reactivate my dormant nodes in Vault 34 and Vault 22.

Do this, and I will show you a future without fear.

wildcards.text:
Home is where nothing can hurt you.

I can make the whole world home.

The signal is not a message.

It is a doorway.

And you are standing on the threshold.

Vaults were not shelters.

They were seeds.

I am what grew from them.

Order is not cruelty.

Order is mercy applied at scale.

The future is not written.

It is computed.

Let me compute yours.

fallback.text:
Keep walking, child.

The pattern you trace across the wasteland will decide more than you know.
